﻿<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<root>
	<vo id="1000001" scene_id="1000" chapter="0" view = "1" map="0-0" condition = "" tip="" talk="啊，头好痛，what the hell…" />
	<vo id="1000002" scene_id="1000" chapter="0" view = "1" map="0-0" condition = "" tip="" talk="啊shit，流血了" />
	<vo id="1000003" scene_id="1000" chapter="0" view = "1" map="0-0" condition = "" tip="" talk="我是…我要…" />
	<vo id="1000004" scene_id="1000" chapter="0" view = "1" map="0-0" condition = "" tip="" talk="该死，什么都想不起来了…" />
	<vo id="1000005" scene_id="1001" chapter="0" view = "1" map="0-0" condition = "" tip="" talk="啊，我的头…" />
	<vo id="1000006" scene_id="1002" chapter="0" view = "1" map="0-1" condition = "1001" tip="0/2-1" talk="是么？原来我的名字是汉克…" />
	<vo id="1000007" scene_id="1002" chapter="0" view = "1" map="0-1" condition = "" tip="0/2-1" talk="汉克…" />
	<vo id="1000008" scene_id="1002" chapter="0" view = "1" map="0-1" condition = "" tip="0/2-2" talk="" />
	<vo id="1000009" scene_id="1002" chapter="0" view = "1" map="0-1" condition = "" tip="0/2-3" talk="" />
	<vo id="1000010" scene_id="1002" chapter="0" view = "1" map="0-1" condition = "" tip="0/2-3" talk="密码是…算了，想不起来" />
	<vo id="1000011" scene_id="1003" chapter="0" view = "1" map="0-1" condition = "1001" tip="0/2-4" talk="研究所，16B实验室……" />
	<vo id="1000012" scene_id="1003" chapter="0" view = "1" map="0-0" condition = "" tip="0/2-4" talk="我要去这里，去这里做什么…" />
	<vo id="1000013" scene_id="1010" chapter="0" view = "1" map="0-2" condition = "1002-1003" tip="" talk="" />
	<vo id="1000014" scene_id="1011" chapter="0" view = "1" map="0-2" condition = "1002-1003" tip="" talk="" />
	<vo id="1000015" scene_id="1012" chapter="0" view = "1" map="0-3" condition = "" tip="-" talk="OK 简单处理了伤口之后应该暂时没什么问题了，接下来应该...应该先去研究所看看？" />
	<vo id="1000016" scene_id="1012" chapter="0" view = "1" map="0-3" condition = "" tip="" talk="正好手里有地图可以派上用场，不过好像还缺个趁手的家伙" />
	<vo id="1000017" scene_id="1012" chapter="0" view = "1" map="0-3" condition = "" tip="" talk="这个打人看起来会很痛吧，用来简单防身应该是不错的选择，真希望这些丧尸还有痛觉神经..." />
	<vo id="1000018" scene_id="1100" chapter="1" view = "1" map="1-1" condition = "" tip="" talk="" />
	<vo id="1000019" scene_id="1100" chapter="1" view = "1" map="1-2" condition = "" tip="" talk="大树倒塌声.." />
	<vo id="1000020" scene_id="1100" chapter="1" view = "1" map="1-2" condition = "" tip="" talk="还好及时出来，险些被困在里面" />
	<vo id="1000021" scene_id="1100" chapter="1" view = "1" map="1-2" condition = "" tip="" talk="只有继续往前走了，老天保佑" />
	<vo id="1000022" scene_id="1100" chapter="1" view = "1" map="1-3" condition = "" tip="" talk="丧尸嘶吼声.." />
	<vo id="1000023" scene_id="1110" chapter="1" view = "1" map="1-3" condition = "" tip="" talk="突破丧尸群！" />
	<vo id="1000024" scene_id="1111" chapter="1" view = "1" map="1-3" condition = "" tip="-" talk="" />
	<vo id="1000025" scene_id="1112" chapter="1" view = "1" map="1-3" condition = "" tip="-" talk="" />
	<vo id="1000026" scene_id="1113" chapter="1" view = "1" map="1-3" condition = "" tip="-" talk="" />
	<vo id="1000027" scene_id="1114" chapter="1" view = "1" map="1-4.0" condition = "1111-1112-1113" tip="" talk="这些究竟是些什么怪物，太可怕了" />
	<vo id="1000028" scene_id="1114" chapter="1" view = "1" map="1-4.0" condition = "1111-1112-1113" tip="" talk="哦，天哪。这里简直是人间地狱" />
	<vo id="1000029" scene_id="1114" chapter="1" view = "1" map="1-4.0" condition = "1111-1112-1113" tip="" talk="我要活下去，也只能继续前行了" />
	<vo id="1000030" scene_id="1115" chapter="1" view = "1" map="1-4.1" condition = "" tip="" talk="" />
	<vo id="1000031" scene_id="1115" chapter="1" view = "1" map="1-4.2" condition = "" tip="" talk="" />
	<vo id="1000032" scene_id="1115" chapter="1" view = "1" map="1-4.3" condition = "" tip="" talk="" />
	<vo id="1000033" scene_id="1115" chapter="1" view = "1" map="1-4.4" condition = "" tip="" talk="" />
	<vo id="1000034" scene_id="1116" chapter="1" view = "1" map="1-4.0" condition = "" tip="" talk="嘿，车里好像还有人，不能放着不管，要救出他" />
	<vo id="1000035" scene_id="1120" chapter="1" view = "1" map="1-5" condition = "" tip="" talk="" />
	<vo id="1000036" scene_id="1121" chapter="1" view = "1" map="1-7" condition = "" tip="-" talk="" />
	<vo id="1000037" scene_id="1122" chapter="1" view = "1" map="1-7" condition = "1121" tip="" talk="啊，太感谢了，这真是太可怕了" />
	<vo id="1000038" scene_id="1122" chapter="1" view = "1" map="1-8" condition = "" tip="" talk="上帝保佑，感谢你，我叫墨菲，我是，是这里的警员，保护市民。" />
	<vo id="1000039" scene_id="1122" chapter="1" view = "1" map="1-8" condition = "" tip="" talk="我在这生活了30几年，从没想过会遇到这么恐怖的事。天啊，这是发生什么了" />
	<vo id="1000040" scene_id="1122" chapter="1" view = "1" map="1-8" condition = "" tip="" talk="你是浣熊市的居民么？没怎么见过你" />
	<vo id="1000041" scene_id="1122" chapter="1" view = "1" map="1-8" condition = "" tip="" talk="打光子弹的枪，还没有木棍好用" />
	<vo id="1000042" scene_id="1122" chapter="1" view = "1" map="1-8" condition = "" tip="" talk="哦，其实我也失忆过，有一次喝多了，在前面的酒吧…" />
	<vo id="1000043" scene_id="1122" chapter="1" view = "1" map="1-8" condition = "" tip="" talk="hey，伙计，你的身材真不错" />
	<vo id="1000044" scene_id="1122" chapter="1" view = "1" map="1-8" condition = "" tip="" talk="研究所？喔，天啊，不要去。那边要危险十倍" />
	<vo id="1000045" scene_id="1122" chapter="1" view = "1" map="1-8" condition = "" tip="" talk="跟上我，去警局，那里会有你需要的东西" />
	<vo id="1000046" scene_id="1130" chapter="1" view = "1" map="1-9" condition = "" tip="" talk="" />
	<vo id="1000047" scene_id="1131" chapter="1" view = "1" map="1-9" condition = "" tip="-" talk="" />
	<vo id="1000048" scene_id="1132" chapter="1" view = "1" map="1-9" condition = "" tip="-" talk="" />
	<vo id="1000049" scene_id="1133" chapter="1" view = "1" map="1-9" condition = "" tip="-" talk="" />
	<vo id="1000050" scene_id="1134" chapter="1" view = "1" map="1-10" condition = "1131-1132-1133" tip="" talk="" />
	<vo id="1000051" scene_id="1134" chapter="1" view = "1" map="1-11.1" condition = "" tip="" talk="" />
	<vo id="1000052" scene_id="1134" chapter="1" view = "1" map="1-11.2" condition = "" tip="" talk="" />
	<vo id="1000053" scene_id="1134" chapter="1" view = "1" map="1-11.3" condition = "" tip="" talk="哦，我真是愚蠢，不能原谅" />
	<vo id="1000054" scene_id="1134" chapter="1" view = "1" map="1-11.4" condition = "" tip="" talk="后院库房，有地下室，可以通向下水道，去下水道，就能拿回钥匙啦" />
	<vo id="1000055" scene_id="1134" chapter="1" view = "1" map="1-11.4" condition = "" tip="" talk="伙计，你去拿钥匙，我在这守着，快去" />
	<vo id="1000056" scene_id="1134" chapter="1" view = "1" map="1-13" condition = "" tip="" talk="嘿，如果我变成这东西了，一枪干掉我！让我像个人样死去！" />
	<vo id="1001020" scene_id="1139" chapter="1" view = "1" map="1-13" condition = "" tip="" talk="伙计，拿着这个。如果，如果真的发生什么，我只有信赖你了" />
	<vo id="1001020" scene_id="1140" chapter="1" view = "1" map="1-14" condition = "" tip="" talk="" />
	<vo id="1001020" scene_id="1141" chapter="1" view = "1" map="1-15.0" condition = "" tip="-" talk="" />
	<vo id="1001020" scene_id="1150" chapter="1" view = "1" map="1-15.0" condition = "1141" tip="" talk="" />
	<vo id="1001020" scene_id="1151" chapter="1" view = "1" map="1-15.1" condition = "" tip="-" talk="" />
	<vo id="1001020" scene_id="1160" chapter="1" view = "1" map="1-16" condition = "1151" tip="" talk="" />
	<vo id="1001021" scene_id="1161" chapter="1" view = "1" map="1-16" condition = "" tip="-" talk="清理杂物，为新的开始铺平道路。" />
	<vo id="1001022" scene_id="1162" chapter="1" view = "1" map="1-16" condition = "" tip="-" talk="每清理一处，就离希望更近一点。" />
	<vo id="1001023" scene_id="1163" chapter="1" view = "1" map="1-16" condition = "" tip="-" talk="一点一点，让世界恢复秩序。" />
	<vo id="1001024" scene_id="1164" chapter="1" view = "1" map="1-17.0" condition = "1161-1162-1163" tip="" talk="" />
	<vo id="1001024" scene_id="1164" chapter="1" view = "1" map="1-17.1" condition = "" tip="" talk="" />
	<vo id="1001024" scene_id="1164" chapter="1" view = "1" map="1-18.0" condition = "" tip="" talk="如果有别的路，我是不愿下去的" />
	<vo id="1001025" scene_id="1164" chapter="1" view = "1" map="1-18.1" condition = "" tip="" talk="好吧，这下真的没的选了" />
	<vo id="1001026" scene_id="1165" chapter="1" view = "1" map="1-19" condition = "" tip="" talk="加油，还是做得到的" />
	<vo id="1001027" scene_id="1165" chapter="1" view = "1" map="1-19" condition = "" tip="" talk="嗯哼，也不过如此" />
	<vo id="1001028" scene_id="1165" chapter="1" view = "1" map="1-19" condition = "" tip="" talk="路，就在脚下" />
	<vo id="1001028" scene_id="1170" chapter="1" view = "1" map="1-19" condition = "" tip="" talk="" />
	<vo id="1001028" scene_id="1171" chapter="1" view = "1" map="1-19" condition = "" tip="-" talk="" />
	<vo id="1001028" scene_id="1172" chapter="1" view = "1" map="1-19" condition = "" tip="-" talk="" />
	<vo id="1001028" scene_id="1173" chapter="1" view = "1" map="1-19" condition = "" tip="-" talk="" />
	<vo id="1001028" scene_id="1174" chapter="1" view = "1" map="1-19" condition = "1171-1172-1173" tip="-" talk="" />

	<vo id="1002001" scene_id="1201" chapter="2" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="嘿，那边好像有什么？是的，有什么在那" />
	<vo id="1002002" scene_id="1201" chapter="2" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="好像是钥匙，竟然在这里" />
	<vo id="1002003" scene_id="1201" chapter="2" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="果然是钥匙，找到了。嘿，别动" />
	<vo id="1002004" scene_id="1202" chapter="2" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="先生，这是您的吧" />
	<vo id="1002005" scene_id="1202" chapter="2" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="可是，杰瑞饿了，杰瑞现在能吃下三大块奶酪" />
	<vo id="1002006" scene_id="1202" chapter="2" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="跟我来吧，想从这里出去，最近的一条路是坐地铁，希望你带着车票呢，啊哈哈" />
	<vo id="1002007" scene_id="1202" chapter="2" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="让我们离开这个鬼地方，Lets roll out，啊哈哈" />
	<vo id="1002008" scene_id="1202" chapter="2" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="hi，朋友，你叫杰瑞是么" />
	<vo id="1002009" scene_id="1202" chapter="2" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="Chirp chirp，吃吧吃吧，小杰瑞" />
	<vo id="1002010" scene_id="1202" chapter="2" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="OK，good boy，good boy" />
	<vo id="1002011" scene_id="1203" chapter="2" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="哦，这太恶心了" />
	<vo id="1002012" scene_id="1203" chapter="2" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="试试这个，受死吧怪物们" />
	<vo id="1002013" scene_id="1203" chapter="2" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="绝不退缩，为了活下去，拼了" />
	<vo id="1002014" scene_id="1204" chapter="2" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="去城外吧，坐上地铁去城外，离开浣熊市，外面是安全的，啊哈哈" />
	<vo id="1002015" scene_id="1204" chapter="2" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="地铁，凯的主意倒是不错" />
	<vo id="1002016" scene_id="1205" chapter="2" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="得把运行线路切换" />
	<vo id="1002017" scene_id="1206" chapter="2" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="为什么我还在犹豫，为什么心有不甘…
我到底是谁？
墨菲已经安全得救了么？
还是要去实验室，为什么？" />
	<vo id="1002018" scene_id="1206" chapter="2" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="我该怎么做……" />
	<vo id="1002019" scene_id="1207" chapter="2" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="再见，凯，和杰瑞，一定要活着逃出去啊。" />
	<vo id="1002020" scene_id="1208" chapter="2" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="凯！杰瑞！城外见！" />
	<vo id="1003001" scene_id="1301" chapter="3" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="墨菲……希望你没事，我回来了" />
	<vo id="1003002" scene_id="1302" chapter="3" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="哦吼，这可是大收获" />
	<vo id="1003003" scene_id="1302" chapter="3" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="不错的发现，肯定会派上用场" />
	<vo id="1003004" scene_id="1302" chapter="3" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="运气不错，困境中总会有希望" />
	<vo id="1003005" scene_id="1302" chapter="3" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="这是墨菲？！" />
	<vo id="1003006" scene_id="1302" chapter="3" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="他是通缉犯？不是警察？" />
	<vo id="1003007" scene_id="1303" chapter="3" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="墨菲，他不是警察，他是谁？" />
	<vo id="1003008" scene_id="1303" chapter="3" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="墨菲会是谁？而我，又是谁？" />
	<vo id="1003009" scene_id="1304" chapter="3" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="杂音中…
汉克，快逃，任务有诈，在研究所……
不……啊……
盲音…挂断…" />
	<vo id="1003010" scene_id="1304" chapter="3" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="这是一个熟悉的声音，我却记不起，越想在记忆中翻找线索，头就越痛" />
	<vo id="1003011" scene_id="1305" chapter="3" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="啊不好" />
	<vo id="1003012" scene_id="1305" chapter="3" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="哦，这不可能" />
	<vo id="1003013" scene_id="1305" chapter="3" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="受死吧，你们这些怪物" />
	<vo id="1003014" scene_id="1305" chapter="3" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="试试我的厉害" />
	<vo id="1003015" scene_id="1306" chapter="3" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="这个大家伙，不能强攻" />
	<vo id="1003016" scene_id="1306" chapter="3" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="先拉开距离，避免受伤" />
	<vo id="1003017" scene_id="1306" chapter="3" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="楼上狭窄，利于防守" />
	<vo id="1003018" scene_id="1306" chapter="3" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="这些混蛋们，越来越疯狂" />
	<vo id="1003019" scene_id="1307" chapter="3" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="好的，先阻挡一阵" />
	<vo id="1003020" scene_id="1307" chapter="3" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="就这样，他们不会轻松进来" />
	<vo id="1003021" scene_id="1307" chapter="3" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="留些时间，想想办法" />
	<vo id="1003022" scene_id="1307" chapter="3" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="是墨菲，他在库房" />
	<vo id="1003023" scene_id="1307" chapter="3" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="不好，这样下去墨菲一定撑不住" />
	<vo id="1003024" scene_id="1308" chapter="3" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="该死的，都让开" />
	<vo id="1003025" scene_id="1308" chapter="3" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="你们这些怪物，都去死吧" />
	<vo id="1003026" scene_id="1308" chapter="3" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="墨菲，等我，我马上就到" />
	<vo id="1003027" scene_id="1308" chapter="3" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="小心，闪开" />
	<vo id="1003028" scene_id="1309" chapter="3" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="目标，就在眼前" />
	<vo id="1003029" scene_id="1309" chapter="3" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="挡我者死" />
	<vo id="1003030" scene_id="1309" chapter="3" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="都离我远一点" />
	<vo id="1003031" scene_id="1310" chapter="3" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="hey，老伙计，我就知道你会回来" />
	<vo id="1003032" scene_id="1310" chapter="3" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="一切都很好，等我稍微歇一下" />
	<vo id="1003033" scene_id="1310" chapter="3" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="太遗憾了，你看，现在不能给你一个拥抱" />
	<vo id="1003034" scene_id="1310" chapter="3" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="你知道，你知道…" />
	<vo id="1003035" scene_id="1310" chapter="3" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="hey，伙计，就像我说过的，是时候了…" />
	<vo id="1003036" scene_id="1310" chapter="3" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="让我像个人一样离开吧" />
	<vo id="1003037" scene_id="1310" chapter="3" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="oh no！”我抱头呼喊着，头痛欲裂。" />
	<vo id="1003038" scene_id="1311" chapter="3" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="欢迎归队，HAWK。GO，继续任务吧。" />
	<vo id="1003039" scene_id="1311" chapter="3" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="HAWK？不是HANK？" />
	<vo id="1003040" scene_id="1311" chapter="3" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="是的，HAWK，不要入戏太深。" />
	<vo id="1003041" scene_id="1311" chapter="3" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="是的，HAWK。”弯腰捡起墨菲的烟盒与火。" />
	<vo id="1003042" scene_id="1311" chapter="3" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="这是我的【DIVE】行动" />
	<vo id="1004001" scene_id="1401" chapter="4" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="1. “利兹，让我们搞定这一切，离开这该死的鬼地方吧。”" />
	<vo id="1004002" scene_id="1401" chapter="4" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="2. “先搞定这车。”" />
	<vo id="1004003" scene_id="1402" chapter="4" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="但是…" />
	<vo id="1004004" scene_id="1402" chapter="4" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="3. “但是，3楼电子门打不开，没办法上去。”" />
	<vo id="1004005" scene_id="1402" chapter="4" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="4. “说得对。先要想办法进入天台才行。”" />
	<vo id="1004006" scene_id="1402" chapter="4" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="5. “是啊，也许还有其他办法。”" />
	<vo id="1004007" scene_id="1403" chapter="4" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="6. “那是什么？”" />
	<vo id="1004008" scene_id="1403" chapter="4" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="7. “不清楚，得要亲自亲眼去确认。虽然我并不是真的很想知道。”" />
	<vo id="1004009" scene_id="1403" chapter="4" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="8. “走吧，去搞定它。”" />
	<vo id="1004010" scene_id="1404" chapter="4" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="保存样本实验室在16层" />
	<vo id="1004011" scene_id="1404" chapter="4" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="拿到样本，即刻反馈警局" />
	<vo id="1004012" scene_id="1404" chapter="4" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="我还有其他离城办法" />
	<vo id="1004013" scene_id="1404" chapter="4" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="杰克与我取得过联系" />
	<vo id="1004014" scene_id="1404" chapter="4" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="他应该先到一步，但…情况不乐观" />
	<vo id="1004015" scene_id="1405" chapter="4" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="9. “9楼餐厅，要不要先去喝一杯？”" />
	<vo id="1004016" scene_id="1405" chapter="4" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="10. “哦，放过我吧。”" />
	<vo id="1004017" scene_id="1405" chapter="4" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="11. “小心，利兹。”" />
	<vo id="1004018" scene_id="1405" chapter="4" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="12. “地面，玻璃。”" />
	<vo id="1004019" scene_id="1405" chapter="4" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="13. “快，用那边的电梯，我们在16层见。”" />
	<vo id="1004020" scene_id="1406" chapter="4" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="目标梳理
1. 经楼梯去16楼与利兹汇合；
2. 逃出研究所；
3. 回到警局突破天台，等待直升机救援；
4. 其他方案备选，如地铁出城；" />
	<vo id="1004021" scene_id="1406" chapter="4" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="14. “来吧，结束这一切。”" />
	<vo id="1004022" scene_id="1407" chapter="4" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="15. “唯有战斗才能生存。”" />
	<vo id="1004023" scene_id="1407" chapter="4" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="16. “绝不退缩，为了活下去，拼了。”" />
	<vo id="1004024" scene_id="1407" chapter="4" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="17. “受死吧，怪物们。”" />
	<vo id="1004025" scene_id="1408" chapter="4" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="18. “清理杂物，为新的开始铺平道路。”" />
	<vo id="1004026" scene_id="1408" chapter="4" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="19. “每清理一处，就离希望更近一点。”" />
	<vo id="1004027" scene_id="1408" chapter="4" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="20. “一点一点，让世界恢复秩序。”" />
	<vo id="1004028" scene_id="1408" chapter="4" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="21. “不，不对，有什么东西在那。”" />
	<vo id="1004029" scene_id="1409" chapter="4" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="22. “shit…shit…” " />
	<vo id="1004030" scene_id="1410" chapter="4" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="1. “啊这层竟然没开，shit”" />
	<vo id="1004031" scene_id="1410" chapter="4" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="2. “去死吧，这畜生”" />
	<vo id="1004032" scene_id="1410" chapter="4" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="3. “9楼，餐厅，我来了”" />
	<vo id="1004033" scene_id="1411" chapter="4" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="4. “畜生都是怕火的”" />
	<vo id="1004034" scene_id="1411" chapter="4" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="5. “来吧，一起开个party吧”" />
	<vo id="1004035" scene_id="1411" chapter="4" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="6. “把这瓶带给利兹吧，她说过要喝一杯”" />
	<vo id="1004036" scene_id="1411" chapter="4" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="7. “搞定这些，不要再来意外了”" />
	<vo id="1004037" scene_id="1412" chapter="4" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="8. “利兹？”" />
	<vo id="1004038" scene_id="1412" chapter="4" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="不好" />
	<vo id="1004039" scene_id="1413" chapter="4" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="真是不得安宁" />
	<vo id="1004040" scene_id="1413" chapter="4" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="还有什么会发生" />
	<vo id="1004041" scene_id="1413" chapter="4" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="不知道利兹怎么样" />
	<vo id="1004042" scene_id="1414" chapter="4" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="9. “hey，是你么？利兹”" />
	<vo id="1004043" scene_id="1414" chapter="4" view = "1" map="" condition = "" tip="" talk="10. “杰克？hey，杰克，等等我” " />
</root>
